original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘sālakalyāṇikāya ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena sāla kalyāṇikāya ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti yam vadesi katamam tam ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, sālakalyāṇikā nāma antopathaviyaṁyeva abhivaḍḍhati hatthasatampi bhiyyopi;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja sālakalyāṇikā nāma antopathaviyayā iva abhivaḍḍhati hattha satampi bhiyyopi

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena cattāri sāmaññaphalāni catasso paṭisambhidā chaḷabhiññāyo kevalañca samaṇadhammaṁ suññāgāreyeva paripūrayitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena cattāri sāmañña phalāni catasso paṭisambhidā chaḍ abhiññāyo kevalam ca samaṇa dhammam suññāgāreya iva paripūrayitabba

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, sālakalyāṇikāya ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: mahā rāja sāla kalyāṇikāya ekam aṅgam
